setup_commands: (command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba create -p ./env python=3.10 pip -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda create -p ./env python=3.10 pip -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv instead" && python3 -m venv ./env)

(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba env create -f repo/esm/environment.yml -p ./env_esmfold) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda env create -f repo/esm/environment.yml -p ./env_esmfold) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, ESM environment creation failed" && exit 1)
